terms.label: Glossary
terms.longDef: Glossaries are collections of terms and their definitions.
terms.shortDef: Glossaries are collections of terms and their definitions.

terms.label: Taxonomy
terms.longDef: Taxonomies are classification schemes. Terms in a taxonomy give names to sets of things. Classes are often put into relation via hierarchical relation ships to express super and subclasses of things.

terms.label: Thesaurus
terms.longDef: Thesauri are word nets. They are informal sets of terms which are put into relation.
